languages.text: На короткий период Осколок К'тан становится уязвимым ко всем атакам.
languages.original_text: For a short period, the C'tan Shard becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}vulnerable{/g} to all attacks.

traits.locale_text: На короткий период Осколок К'тан становится уязвимым ко всем атакам.
На короткий период Осколок К'тан становится уязвимым ко всем атакам.

languages.text: For a short period, the C'tan Shard becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}vulnerable{/g} to all attacks.
languages.original_text: На короткий период Осколок К'тан становится уязвимым ко всем атакам.

traits.locale_text: For a short period, the C'tan Shard becomes vulnerable to all attacks.
For a short period, the C'tan Shard becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}vulnerable{/g} to all attacks.

languages.text: Durante un breve período, el fragmento de C'tan se vuelve {g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}vulnerable{/g} a todos los ataques.
languages.original_text: For a short period, the C'tan Shard becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}vulnerable{/g} to all attacks.

traits.locale_text: Durante un breve período, el fragmento de C'tan se vuelve {g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}vulnerable{/g} a todos los ataques.

languages.text: 在短时间内，星神碎片对所有攻击都处于{g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}易伤{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: For a short period, the C'tan Shard becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}vulnerable{/g} to all attacks.

traits.locale_text: 在短时间内，星神碎片对所有攻击都处于{g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}易伤{/g}状态。

languages.text: しばらくの間、ク＝タン・シャードは全ての攻撃に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}脆弱化{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: For a short period, the C'tan Shard becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}vulnerable{/g} to all attacks.

traits.locale_text: しばらくの間、ク＝タン・シャードは全ての攻撃に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}脆弱化{/g}になる。

languages.text: Für kurze Zeit wird das C'tan-Fragment für alle Angriffe {g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}verwundbar{/g}.
languages.original_text: For a short period, the C'tan Shard becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}vulnerable{/g} to all attacks.

traits.locale_text: Für kurze Zeit wird das C'tan-Fragment für alle Angriffe {g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}verwundbar{/g}.

languages.text: L'Écharde C'tan devient brièvement {g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}vulnérable{/g} à toutes les attaques.
languages.original_text: For a short period, the C'tan Shard becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}vulnerable{/g} to all attacks.

traits.locale_text: L'Écharde C'tan devient brièvement {g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}vulnérable{/g} à toutes les attaques.
